Join Our Tech Team
Become a vital part of our tech team, where you'll be primarily responsible for developing and operating our server-side infrastructure. Collaborating closely with our CEO, you will play a key role in scaling our products and ensuring their reliability. This position involves hands-on coding (90%) and strategic planning (10%).
Key Responsibilities:
Develop robust server-side applications using PHP
Design and implement scalable server architectures and infrastructures
Lead the CI/CD pipeline setup and management
Manage and optimize SQL databases
Create automated test suites to ensure product reliability
Select and manage tools for effective system monitoring, reflecting best practices
Required Technical Skills:
Expertise in PHP (knowledge in Python is a strong plus)
Proficient with Docker and Kubernetes
Experience in designing and managing automated CI/CD workflows
Strong understanding of both relational and non-relational databases
Professional Attributes:
At least 5 years of experience in backend development
Minimum 2 years of experience involving DevOps practices, preferably in high-traffic environments
If your skills and expertise match the requirements of this position, please send us your CV for review. Additionally, if you have a portfolio or examples of previous work, we would be interested in seeing them. We are eager to assess your qualifications and establish a cooperative relationship as soon as possible.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Job Type: Full-time
Work Location: In person

About the company
JBK Technologies Private Limited is a subsidiary of a US based technologies and business consulting firm, Grove86 Group in NY/NJ. Grove86 specializes in technology and business consulting for startups and VC-backed companies. We help resolve the most critical matters: technology, strategy, marketing, organization, operations, and budgeting, while focusing on the entrepreneur’s idea and opportunities. And, Yes, we also provide full service branding and digital solutions to your business.
Our Mission:
We don’t want to let your ideas vaporize just because you don’t have enough capital or the right technology resources. Many noble ideas just die down because technology seems too complex or too expensive. At Grove86 we help kick-start new ideas by providing technology and product development consulting.
The Role
We are seeking a motivated and talented PHP Developer to join our growing team. As a PHP Developer, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting web development projects, collaborating with a team of experienced developers. This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about PHP development and wants to expand their skills in a supportive and challenging environment.
Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with the development team to design, develop, and maintain PHP-based web applications
- Write clean and efficient code, following best practices and coding standards
- Troubleshoot and debug issues that arise during the development process
- Coordinate with co-developers and keeps project manager well informed of the status of development effort and serves as liaison between development staff and project manager
- Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and trends in PHP development
Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
- Solid understanding of PHP programming language and its frameworks (e.g., Laravel, CodeIgniter)
- Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - Familiarity with relational databases and SQL
- Strong problem-solving and analytical skills
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple projects simultaneously
- Self-motivated and eager to learn and grow as a developer
Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
- Knowledge of RESTful APIs and integration
- Familiarity with Agile development methodologies
- Understanding of cross-browser compatibility and responsive web design
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: ₹400,000.00 - ₹1,000,000.00 per year

Health insurance
Paid sick time
Provident Fund

Day shift
Monday to Friday

About Us:
NeoSoft Technologies is a dynamic and innovative tech company dedicated to creating cutting-edge web applications. We are seeking a skilled Laravel Developer to join our team in Ahmedabad. If you are passionate about web development and have a strong background in both backend and frontend technologies, we want to hear from you!
Key Responsibilities:
Web Development:
Develop, test, and maintain dynamic web applications using Laravel and PHP.
Frontend Integration:
Integrate front-end components with server-side logic to create seamless user experiences using jQuery.
Database Management:
Design and manage MySQL databases to ensure optimal performance and scalability.
API Integration:
Implement and integrate third-party APIs and web services.
Code Optimization:
Write clean, well-documented, and efficient code following best practices.
Collaboration:
Work closely with other developers, designers, and stakeholders to meet project specifications and deadlines.
Debugging:
Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve issues and bugs in a timely manner.
Client Interaction:
Communicate with clients to understand their requirements and provide updates on project progress.
Documentation:
Maintain comprehensive documentation of code, processes, and methodologies.
Security:
Implement security measures to protect applications and data from potential threats.

Laravel Proficiency:
Minimum 4-5 years of hands-on experience in Laravel development.
PHP Expertise:
Strong experience with PHP for backend development.
Frontend Technologies:
Proficiency in jQuery for front-end development.
Database Management:
Strong experience with MySQL, including database design, optimization, and management.
Version Control:
Hands-on experience with version control tools like Git.
Problem-Solving:
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Communication:
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

RESTful APIs:
Experience in designing and integrating RESTful APIs.
Linux Proficiency:
Experience with Linux-based environments and server management.
Agile Methodology:
Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
Cloud Services:
Basic knowledge of cloud services such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
Educational Qualifications:
Degrees:
B.E/B.Tech/MCA/BCA/M.Sc-IT or equivalent practical experience.
Why Join Us?
Innovative Projects:
Work on cutting-edge projects that challenge you.
Professional Growth:
Opportunities for continuous learning and career advancement.
Collaborative Environment:
Join a team that values creativity, excellence, and innovation.
Flexible Work Culture:
Enjoy a flexible work environment with a focus on work-life balance.
How to Apply:
If you are ready to take on a new challenge and grow your career with us, apply now!

Jr. PHP Developer (Frontend & Backend Skills)
We are looking for someone with excellent command of both frontend and backend technologies, including PHP, HTML/HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and advanced JavaScript frameworks like jQuery.
What We Are Looking For:
Frontend Responsibilities:
1. Develop complex front-end logic in JavaScript (core/native JavaScript and frameworks) for data scraping and widget development.
2. Develop responsive HTML layouts and widgets compatible with different desktop and mobile browsers.
3. Develop logic to scrape and cleanse data from various parts of webpages on target websites in a reliable way using JavaScript.
4. Debug, troubleshoot, and maintain existing websites and implement changes as per customer feedback and requirements.
5. Stay familiar with and updated on recent developments in JavaScript and its frameworks.
Backend Responsibilities:
1. Develop websites and web applications using PHP, MySQL, Apache, HTML, CSS frameworks, and JavaScript.
2. Develop websites and web applications using PHP, MVC frameworks, and related open-source technologies like WordPress.
3. Have an in-depth understanding of the PHP Laravel Framework. Development skills and experience in the Laravel Framework are a big plus.
4. Understand client feedback and provide appropriate resolutions through clear interaction.
5. Involve in the deployment of applications on staging and possibly live servers.
6. Report to your manager about daily work schedules, plans, and milestones.
Desired Profile:
1. Must have at least 1 to 2 years of development experience in HTML/CSS & JavaScript on a complex website/frontend project, as well as PHP & web development.
2. Must be able to perform all of the above with minimal guidance after initial training and induction.
3. Must have strong knowledge of and work experience in both backend and frontend development, particularly on challenging projects.
4. Must possess strong analytical, logical, and problem-solving skills.
5. Must enjoy working on challenging jobs/assignments and going the extra mile in projects to keep clients happy.
6. Must have a decent level of communication skills and be able to communicate with clients on a daily basis with proper reporting.
What You Get:
1. Excellent compensation package.
2. Attractive bonus for best performance.
3. A challenging work environment.
4. Opportunity to work on new technologies.
5. A sense of personal achievement and growth.
6. Excellent, peaceful, friendly, and calm work environment.
7. Freedom to try out new things and take charge of projects.

Ahmedabad, Gujarat. Must be willing to relocate to Ahmedabad.

Job Description
As a Laravel and Vue.js Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using Laravel (PHP) and Vue.js (JavaScript). You will work closely with our team of, designers, and other developers to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions that meet our business needs.

Proven experience with Laravel (PHP) and Vue.js (JavaScript) frameworks.
Strong understanding of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and responsive design principles.
Experience with database management systems (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL).
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
Knowledge of RESTful API design and development.
Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.

Develop and maintain web applications using Laravel and Vue.js.
Collaborate with front-end and back-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.

Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize applications for performance and scalability.
Participate in code reviews, testing, and deployment processes.
Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders to understand requirements and provide technical solutions.

We are seeking a skilled PHP Codeigniter Developer with deep knowledge of PHP, Codeigniter, MySQL, and JavaScript. As a PHP Developer, you will play a key role in the development and maintenance of our Software as a Service (SaaS) products. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 3 years of experience in software development and a strong understanding of PHP and Codeigniter.
Key Responsibilities:
New Module Development:
Develop new features and modules for our SaaS products based on project requirements.
Legacy Support and Bug Fixes:
Provide support for existing modules, troubleshoot issues, and apply bug fixes as required.
Re-development or Rewriting Modules:
Evaluate and redevelop or rewrite modules to enhance performance, scalability, or to incorporate new technologies.
Database Optimization:
Optimize MySQL queries and database performance for improved efficiency.
Node.js/React.js Experience (Optional):
Experience with Node.js and React.js applications is a valuable addition.
Qualifications:
Minimum of 4-8 years of professional software development experience.
Proficiency in PHP, Codeigniter, MySQL, and JavaScript.
Strong knowledge of web development concepts and technologies.
Experience in SaaS product development and maintenance.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Experience in Node.js is a plus and will be given priority.
Familiarity with frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript libraries is a bonus.
What We Offer:
Competitive hourly rate based on skills and experience.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
Collaborative and innovative work environment.
Involvement in challenging and exciting projects.
If you are a dedicated PHP Codeigniter Developer with a passion for creating high-quality software solutions, we encourage you to apply. Join our team and be part of a dynamic company that values your expertise and offers room for career advancement.

Jr. PHP Developer (Frontend & Backend Skills)
We are looking for someone with excellent command of both frontend and backend technologies, including PHP, HTML/HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and advanced JavaScript frameworks like jQuery.
What We Are Looking For:
Frontend Responsibilities:
1. Develop complex front-end logic in JavaScript (core/native JavaScript and frameworks) for data scraping and widget development.
2. Develop responsive HTML layouts and widgets compatible with different desktop and mobile browsers.
3. Develop logic to scrape and cleanse data from various parts of webpages on target websites in a reliable way using JavaScript.
4. Debug, troubleshoot, and maintain existing websites and implement changes as per customer feedback and requirements.
5. Stay familiar with and updated on recent developments in JavaScript and its frameworks.
Backend Responsibilities:
1. Develop websites and web applications using PHP, MySQL, Apache, HTML, CSS frameworks, and JavaScript.
2. Develop websites and web applications using PHP, MVC frameworks, and related open-source technologies like WordPress.
3. Have an in-depth understanding of the PHP Laravel Framework. Development skills and experience in the Laravel Framework are a big plus.
4. Understand client feedback and provide appropriate resolutions through clear interaction.
5. Involve in the deployment of applications on staging and possibly live servers.
6. Report to your manager about daily work schedules, plans, and milestones.
Desired Profile:
1. Must have at least 1 to 2 years of development experience in HTML/CSS & JavaScript on a complex website/frontend project, as well as PHP & web development.
2. Must be able to perform all of the above with minimal guidance after initial training and induction.
3. Must have strong knowledge of and work experience in both backend and frontend development, particularly on challenging projects.
4. Must possess strong analytical, logical, and problem-solving skills.
5. Must enjoy working on challenging jobs/assignments and going the extra mile in projects to keep clients happy.
6. Must have a decent level of communication skills and be able to communicate with clients on a daily basis with proper reporting.
What You Get:
1. Excellent compensation package.
2. Attractive bonus for best performance.
3. A challenging work environment.
4. Opportunity to work on new technologies.
5. A sense of personal achievement and growth.
6. Excellent, peaceful, friendly, and calm work environment.
7. Freedom to try out new things and take charge of projects.

SetuBridge Technolabs is seeking a highly skilled and experienced PHP Developer to join our dynamic team. As a PHP Developer, you will play a critical role in designing, developing, and implementing scalable and robust PHP-based e-commerce solutions.
Responsibilities
A PHP Developer is responsible for designing, coding, and modifying websites and web applications. They collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop efficient and user-friendly solutions. Their tasks include writing clean, well-documented code, troubleshooting and debugging, and ensuring optimal performance. They integrate data storage and management systems, stay updated with emerging technologies, and contribute to the entire software development lifecycle. Laravel Development: Design, develop, and maintain web applications using the Laravel framework, ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and security.
Database Management: Create and optimize database schemas, write efficient and well-documented SQL queries, and work with ORMs (Object-Relational Mapping) when necessary.
API Development: Build RESTful APIs and integrate third-party APIs into web applications as needed.
Code Review: Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and ensure compliance with coding standards.
Bug Fixing: Identify and resolve software defects and issues in a timely manner.
Performance Optimization: Optimize application performance and scalability by implementing caching, code profiling, and other techniques.
Collaboration: Collaborate with front-end developers, UI/UX designers, and product managers to deliver high-quality, user-friendly solutions.
Version Control: Use version control systems (e.g., Git) to manage codebase and collaborate with team members.
Documentation: Create and maintain project documentation, including code comments and technical documentation.
